CustomField.description: Flat Number + Building + Street + Area + Town + Post Code (Combination of all other Premise Fields)
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SPEN_PlotNumber__c)), SPEN_PlotNumber__c &" "& SPEN_FlatNumber__c &" "& SPEN_BuildingNameNumber__c &" "& SPEN_Street__c &" " &SPEN_Area__c &" "& SPEN_Town__c &" "& SPEN_PostCode__c, SPEN_FlatNumber__c &" "& SPEN_BuildingNameNumber__c &" "& SPEN_Street__c &" " &SPEN_Area__c &" "& SPEN_Town__c &" "& SPEN_PostCode__c)
CustomField.label: Full Address
